Q_NAME: Perform Arithmetic Operations using Class and Objects
Q_DESC:
Write a java program to perform arithmetic operations using class and objects.

Mandatory

1.Create a new class "Arith" and in that class create 3 methods read(), arith(), display() to read,perform arithmetic operations and displays the results.
2.Inside arith method do the following arithmetic operations
Addition
Subtraction
Multiplication
Division
Modulus 
3.Create an object named "a" in the main class (TestClass) for the Arith class  and access all the three methods created in the Arith class and display the results of the arithmetic operations.
